author: boudoul
body:
Greetings
this PR is modifying the T5 Tracker geometry following some mechanics studies towards a more realistic description of the inner Pixel Barrel  (changing radii of the inner pixel barrel layers) 

Please note that since the number of modules is changed in those layers (due to the radius change) , the list of detids should also be taken into account by including this file (external) , see : 
https://github.com/cms-data/SLHCUpgradeSimulations-Geometry/pull/7


I didn't create a new scenario in runthematrix, since this is the natural evolution of T5 (but this should not be backported to 93X it's post TDR developments) , but happy to get comments/advices on this.

Modification  the raddii of three out of four inner pixel barrel layers: 
from : 
r | 29.000 | 70.146 | 117.753 | 157.388 | 
to
r | 29.000 | 60.000 | 100.000 | 140.000 | 

all work done by @ghugo83
title: Phase2 Inner Pixel Barrel layers , new radii
